channel.title: Motivation and Introduction on Slightlier Changed Project Title
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation and Introduction on Slightlier Changed Project Title

item.title: Graph Description
item.description: To answer some of the research questions of this project, a graph is a suitable representation of the data. It allows us to describe each wikipedia page as a node, and a reference as a link to another node. Attributes The data we have collected for each page is added as attributes to the nodes in the graph, so we can easily analyse data on the graph after applying methods that filter and group nodes.
